topic: How to deploy serverless handlers using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to deploy serverless handlers using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Deploying Serverless Handlers Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: Learn how to create and deploy serverless APIs using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Configure AWS Lambda and API Gateway
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this tutorial.
FastAPI version 0.74.0 or later is recommended.
caveats: Ensure your AWS CLI and credentials are properly set up before deploying.
Make sure to test locally before deploying to production.
